Hello,

I would like to have control over the test cases and tests that are 
added to a TestSuite. 

I could extend the TestSuite or I could manually add test cases. 
However, I would like to use my new test suite with the existing 
JUnit tools (like SwingRunner, textRunner, etc). These tools seem to 
instantiate a TestSuite. 

Any idea how I can fit my new test suite class into this architecture.

Thanks
